channel.title: Resources on Edward Manning
channel.description: Recent content in Resources on Edward Manning

item.title: Standalone Flash Player (Flash Projector)
item.description:
It took me a while to find this. Only because I didn’t read the actual page! There’s 3 highly visible links leading you away from the standalone player which is below. Adobe call their standalone player a “projector”.

Update: It would help if I posted a link wouldn’t it :) http://www.adobe.com/support/flashplayer/downloads.html

If you can’t find it either, take a look at the picture below.

item.title: Flash without DLM
item.description:
Want to download and install flash without the download manager? I know I do.

Why force installation of a download manager for files that are only a few megabytes? It’s an overhead that simply isn’t required. I don’t need any more rubbish installed on my computer and neither do you.

The links below will take you to the official install files. Download to your local machine and install directly.

Flash installer for Firefox, Safari and Opera

http://fpdownload.adobe.com/get/flashplayer/current/install_flash_player.exe

Flash installer for Internet Explorer

http://fpdownload.adobe.com/get/flashplayer/current/install_flash_player_ax.exe

item.title: Programming and Dot Net Resources
item.description:
A list of resources that I and the people I’m training with have found useful.

General

http://www.codeproject.com/
http://www.csharp-station.com/
http://www.dotnetspider.com/tutorials/
http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/default.aspx
http://www.c-sharpcorner.com/
http://www.functionx.com/csharp/index.htm
http://visualstudiomagazine.com
http://en.csharp-online.net/Main() No longer available
http://www.searchdotnet.com/
http://www.jpboodhoo.com/blog/
http://code.professor-mustard.org/index.htm
http://www.jaggersoft.com/csharp.html

OO

http://www.dofactory.com/Patterns/Patterns.aspx
http://www.atomicobject.com/pages/OO+Programming
http://xunitpatterns.com/index.html

SQL

http://www.techonthenet.com/
http://blogs.msdn.com/adonet/archive/2008/03/26/stored-procedure-mapping.aspx No longer available
http://www.oracle.com/pls/db102/portal.portal_db?selected=3

item.title: Interview Resources
item.description:
Some resources I have found useful while preparing for interviews.

Interview Preparation

10 Do’s of Interviews No longer available
Top 25 Interview Questions No longer available
Great Answers to Tough Interiew Questions (Preview book on Google Books)
Practice Interview Questions

Personal Branding

Lesley Everett
Drop Dead Brilliant (book)
Branding Yourself: How to Look, Sound and Behave Your Way to Success (book)
